Alt Tab Mute.Author: Dom Gintoki
Alt Tab Mute.Description: Mutes the game when it's not focused.

AlwaysDjmax.Author: RobotLucca
AlwaysDjmax.Description: Forces the score screen to always be the DJMax version.

BestCombinationSuggest.Author: brooke_zb
BestCombinationSuggest.Description:
Displays the best character combination for a level in the pause screen.
The character combo displayed is usually correct, but don't put your blind faith in it.
When in doubt, refer to CharacterScoreboard.

CharacterRandomizer.Author: lxy
CharacterRandomizer.Description: Everytime you play a chart, a random character combination will be selected.

CharacterScoreboard.Author: Creepler13
CharacterScoreboard.Description:
Displays which character a specific score was achieved with on the leaderboard. (OCS)
It can also display your own local scores. (LCS)

ChineseMode.Author: RobotLucca
ChineseMode.Description: Censores certain aspects of the game. (Characters, illustrations, etc)

Cinema.Author: AshtonMemer
Cinema.Description: The mod that allows you to see video backgrounds in custom charts.

CustomAlbums.Author: Mo10 & RobotLucca
CustomAlbums.Description: The mod that allows you to load in custom charts.

CustomLoadingScreens.Author: Creepler13
CustomLoadingScreens.Description:
Allows you to add custom loading screens (CustomLoadingScreens folder)
Also allows you to add custom loading screen messages (UserData/CustomLoadingScreens.cfg)
Messages can be paired with an image, or be left as random.

FavGirl.Author: RobotLucca
FavGirl.Description:
Allows you to favorite characters and elfins.
This will make you look like that character even if another character is selected.
You will have the abilities of the selected character & your plays will be submitted as such.

FC AP indicator.Author: lxy
FC AP indicator.Description: Tells you whether you're on All Perfect/Full Combo pace, and displays the number of misses/greats.

Headquarters.Author: AshtonMemer
Headquarters.Description: Allows you to submit scores on custom charts obtained from the MDMC website.

HiddenQoL.Author: RobotLucca
HiddenQoL.Description:
Adds a button to always show hidden difficulties.
E.g. you don't need to spam click and such to unlock them before playing

IntroSkip.Author: RobotLucca
IntroSkip.Description: Skips the "PeroPero HasuHasu" and the opening scene.

MDRPC.Author: Brasileiro
MDRPC.Description: Muse Dash Rich Presence, which is exactly what it says it is.

MuseDashModTools.Author: lxy
MuseDashModTools.Description: Automatically detects and logs available mod updates.

NoAutoPause.Author: AshtonMemer
NoAutoPause.Description: Prevents the game from automatically pausing when the game loses focus.

QuickRestart.Author: AshtonMemer
QuickRestart.Description:
Allows you to use Delete to instantly leave a chart
&
Allows you to use Backspace to instantly restart a chart
Update now allows you to set custom keybinds.

QuickSwitchCombination.Author: lxy
QuickSwitchCombination.Description:
Allows you to set keybinds to quickly change your characters.
Now has an in-game menu to add keybinds:
- You can't remove keybinds in-game. Close the game, remove your keybind, then restart it.
- Do not use "Reload". (Using it to remove keybinds will cause you to remove newly set keybinds. lxy, if you're reading this, plz fix.)

SceneEggs.Author: RobotLucca
SceneEggs.Description: Makes it possible for customs to use certain background decorations that the default charts use.

ScrollSpeed.Author: RobotLucca
ScrollSpeed.Description:
Allows charters (not players) to set custom scroll speeds.
It's completely up to you whether you wanna use this, most charters don't use it though.

Song Desc.Author: lxy
Song Desc.Description: Displays the title, artist, and difficulty of the song in the top-right corner during play.

UI Disable.Author: lxy
UI Disable.Description: Allows you to disable certain visual aspects of the game (example: hit circles)

UltraInstinctSleepwalking.Author: RobotLucca
UltraInstinctSleepwalking.Description: Makes Sleepwalker Rin do mashers at max speed instead of the normal slow speed.

UnlockAll2.Author: RobotLucca
UnlockAll2.Description:
An alternative to UnlockAll.
Master's stay unlocked only for as long as the mod is installed.
